nodes.text: Jyn Erso & Hope Suite is a track from Rogue One: A Star Wars Story composed by Michael Giacchino. It is the nineteenth track on the Rogue One: A Star Wars Story soundtrack. The track was also used to introduce the panelists at the Mandalorian panel at Celebration Chicago in 2019, as well as at the Lucasfilm Animation history panel at Celebration Orlando in 2017.
